    • withLocationWithin

      public B withLocationWithin(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point center, double dist)
      Keep only features whose geometry is contained within the given region, expressed as a circle (i.e. a distance from a given point).
      Parameters:
      center - Center of the circular region of interest
